author: I. P.
Philips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
Partridge, John, fl. 1566-1573.
Pitts, John, fl. 1559-1577.
publisher: by VVilliam Hovv, for Richard Iohnes: and are to be solde at his shop ioyning to the southwest doore of Paules Churche.,
notes: Signed at end: I.P.; Variously attributed to John Philips, John Partridge and John Pitts. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
